text: Fig. 4. Estimation of CTB bound per well. (A) Western blots of known amounts of CTB (ng) were scanned and analyzed for blot density (pixels). Blot density versus CTB amounts were plotted to obtain a logarithmic correlation (inset). (B) The results were performed with a significant correlation between the mean and the median value of the equation from the panel A inset) and compared with fluorescence data from gangliosome analysis of epithelia exposed to the same amounts of CTB. This equation was thereafter used to estimate the amount of CTB bound to epithelia based on gangliosome fluorescence (Fig. 5). Data points represent averages of at least triple size experiments, relative in panel B are present standard deviation of triptake experiments. B T, Relative fluorescence counts.
